CHECKLIST_ITEMS.ITEM1: Effortless. link any sensor to your account and gather specific data about your assets.
CHECKLIST_ITEMS.ITEM2: Automatic. All the data from the sensor is automatically sent to your server– the data is secure and only accessible to you. Or predefined profiles.
CHECKLIST_ITEMS.ITEM3: Clear view. The online dashboard gives a real-time view of your assets and a complete history.
CHECKLIST_ITEMS.ITEM4: Versatile. The supplied APIs inject the Smart Monitoring data into your systems. That way, you can optimize all your processes from A to Z.

INTRO.TITLE: Smart Monitoring
INTRO.SUBTITLE: Surroundings measurements
INTRO.P1: Do you have a complete view of your assets? Are quality controls of high importance to you? Or do you need to meet specific certifications?
INTRO.P2: Smart Monitoring offers a unique view of your assets in order to manage them efficiently. It provides the relevant information to make calculated decisions. Want more information about specific assets? We will identify the sensor for you to generate the right insights.
INTRO.P3: We offer a small discrete datalogger that does not require a sim card or registration. This logger measures temperature, relative humidity and light values. It uses the LoRaWAN® network of Proximus, which allows a long battery lifetime and avoids the need for additional cables.
INTRO.P4: Do you spend a lot of time planning and calculating how much fuel you need to deliver at a certain place and time? Smart Tank makes life easier: this solution measures the level of each tank daily. And notifies you or your customer when it’s time to tank up. Unexpected deliveries? They won’t disrupt your planning anymore.

LIST.L1: Effortless. link any sensor to your account and gather specific data about your assets.
LIST.L2: Automatic. All the data from the sensor is automatically sent to your server– the data is secure and only accessible to you. Or predefined profiles.
LIST.L3: Clear view. The online dashboard gives a real-time view of your assets and a complete history.
LIST.L4: Versatile. The supplied APIs inject the Smart Monitoring data into your systems. That way, you can optimize all your processes from A to Z.

SENSOR1.TITLE: Temperature
SENSOR1.DESCRIPTION: High temperatures can cause chemical damages and increase degradation rate of art, and are good conditions for insects and moldgrowth. Low temperatures can cause condensation of moisture. Temperature fluctuations can effect humidity levels

SENSOR2.TITLE: Humidity
SENSOR2.DESCRIPTION: High humidity can cause moldgrowth or corrosion, and creates good conditions for insects. Low humidity causes risk of mechanical deformation and brittleness of hygroscopic materials. Fluctuations of humidity increase risk of mechanical damage.

SENSOR3.TITLE: Luminosity
SENSOR3.DESCRIPTION: High light values can cause discolouration and increase risk of chemical damage of paint layers and varnishes.

SENSOR4.TITLE: Motion
SENSOR4.DESCRIPTION: Vibration and shocks create a risk of mechanical damage.

PRODUCT1.TITLE: Smart Monitoring
PRODUCT1.DESCRIPTION:
Do you have a complete view of your assets? Are quality controls of high importance to you? Or do you need to meet specific certifications?

Smart Monitoring offers a unique view of your assets in order to manage them efficiently. It provides the relevant information to make calculated decisions. Want more information about specific assets? We will identify the sensor for you to generate the right insights.

PRODUCT2.TITLE: Smart Tank
PRODUCT2.DESCRIPTION: Do you spend a lot of time planning and calculating how much fuel you need to deliver at a certain place and time? Smart Tank makes life easier: this solution measures the level of each tank daily. And notifies you or your customer when it’s time to tank up. Unexpected deliveries? They won’t disrupt your planning anymore.

PRODUCT3.TITLE: Smart Care
PRODUCT3.DESCRIPTION: We offer SmartCare, a small discrete datalogger that does not require a sim card or registration. This logger measures temperature, relative humidity and light values. It uses the LoRaWAN® network of Proximus, which allows a long battery lifetime and avoids the need for additional cables.

PRIVACY_POLICY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY_POLICY.P1: Proximus operates a public Internet-of-Things network with which devices and sensors can send data to the MyThings platform of Proximus. For reasons of privacy, this service is not suitable for locating people.
PRIVACY_POLICY.P2: When you log into Smart Monitoring, the following information is collected to identify and authenticate you:
PRIVACY_POLICY.P3: All your actions on Smart Monitoring are tracked for security purposes for 1 month.
PRIVACY_POLICY.P4: Your e-mail address is used to keep you informed of novelties and updates of the service, unless you unsubscribe via your user settings.
PRIVACY_POLICY.P5: Your account information will be kept as long as your account is active. Once your account has been inactive for 2 years, it will be removed.
PRIVACY_POLICY.P6: For the exercise of your privacy rights you can send an e-mail to

UL.LI4: name of the company you are logging in for

BROWSER_NOT_SUPPORTED_MODAL.TITLE: Browser not supported
BROWSER_NOT_SUPPORTED_MODAL.P1: Oh snap! We don't support this version of your browser, and neither should you!
BROWSER_NOT_SUPPORTED_MODAL.P2: This message is shown because you are using an unsupported browser or an outdated version of your browser, check the list of supported browsers for this functionality below. If your browser is in the list, make sure you have updated it to the latest version.
BROWSER_NOT_SUPPORTED_MODAL.P3: If your browser is in the list of supported browsers and updated to the latest version, please contact our support service.

INFO.MORE_INFO: For more information and support please contact us at

INFO.TECHINCAL_PROBLEMS: Assistance in case of technical issues
INFO.HAPPY_TO_ASSIST: We would be happy to assist you
INFO.FORGOT_PASSWORD_TEXT: If you can’t remember your Smart Monitoring ID password, you can reset it and regain access to your account
